name: Platformer
description:
3Elements presents Platformer!


What kind of mystery is hidden in the world of Platformer?
A day and night system that will have you crafting torches to see at night,
continuous scrolling worlds, multiple biomes, enemies, weapons, tools, and more!

Collect ore and create armor, fight monsters and build a base,
or collect various weapons to become stronger and faster.

Decorate your house with furniture, customize your character, and play with your friends!

Key Elements

  • Sandbox crafting survival system
  • Randomly generated looping worlds
  • Customizable characters
  • Unique monsters and weapons
  • Free updates
  • Multiplayer
